column4: Ok, sorry I have to ask again.  How do I upgrade to 8.10 from 8.04 (I saw something about going o system-> software sources, but it got cut off do to all the disconnections)
No wait, I misread, that was right
If you installed Fluxbox or something (I use AfterStep) you *could* do "sudo apt-get distupgrade", once all the updating is done
